JOB DESCRIPTION:
Should have a degree B.E./ B.Tech/ MCA/ BCA

Knowledge of software development life cycle

Awareness of coding and unit testing tools,  Issue tracking tools

Knowledge of various software development technologies & their potential

Expertise in coding practices and basic programming patterns

Job Description 

Involved in efficient coding and documenting it as per the design specification of module /  component

Unit Testing,  debugging and maintaining the code

Deploying components and/  or application

Cracking technology roadblocks

Assist analysts and/ or designers in researching and documenting the users requirements & design

Understand release cycle and performing in various phases including packaging and deployment

Involved in preparing low level design document and module scheduling
